trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGME102_04933_SEQ_00<tab>Wuk Lamat is eager to head to Everkeep.
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Cahciua in front of Everkeep.
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Cahciua in front of Everkeep.
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat again.
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat yet again.
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_ALISAIE_000_001<tab>Nostalgia and Wayakkwe remind me of Alphinaud and myself. Similar but so very different. We should chat sometime, trade twin tales.
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_KRILE_000_005<tab>It takes no small amount of courage to oppose Zoraal Ja and his army. The members of Oblivion must be driven indeed.
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_GRAHATIA_000_010<tab>At long last, we're entering the tower! ...N-Not that I'm excited or anything. Not <var 1A 02 /var>unduly<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_ERENVILLE_000_015<tab>Twelve help her if she's mentioned anything embarrassing.
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_WUKLAMAT_000_020<tab>Right, Cahciua is waiting. Let's head to the tower.
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_CAHCIUA_000_030<tab>Ah, there you are!
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_CAHCIUA_000_031<tab>If Queen Sphene has registered you as guests, you should be able to march right in.
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_WUKLAMAT_000_032<tab>And if she hasn't?
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_CAHCIUA_000_033<tab>Then you may have a swarm of Zoraal Ja's minions to deal with.
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_WUKLAMAT_000_034<tab>Nothing for it but to see if Sphene has betrayed us, eh?
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_CAHCIUA_000_035<tab>Thank you for your diligent service, friends. My companions and I would like to pass, if you'd be so kind?
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_ROBOTSENTRY04933_000_036<tab>Outrunner guide unit identified. Registration number...verified.
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_ROBOTSENTRY04933_000_037<tab>Six accompanying civilians identified. Verifying credentials...
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_ROBOTSENTRY04933_000_038<tab>Credentials verified. Welcome, guests of Queen Sphene.
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_KRILE_000_039<tab>What a relief...
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_CAHCIUA_000_040<tab>There you have it. It seems the queen was true to her word.
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_CAHCIUA_000_041<tab>Follow me, everyone. Solution Nine awaits!
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_WUKLAMAT_000_060<tab>Towers inside a tower... I see it but I still can't believe it...
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_WUKLAMAT_000_061<tab>Hmm... For now, I say we proceed straight ahead! If we feel like we're getting lost, we can always turn around and go back the way we came.
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_WUKLAMAT_000_070<tab>Ugh, a crossroads already? This place is too much... I've no idea where I should go...
TEXT_KINGME102_04933_WUKLAMAT_000_071<tab>Right, I've made up my mind! Let's head to that building there!
